title: Regarding malpractice policy at PESU
content:
Could anyone please let me know what are the policies inline for malpractice in ESA ? Student found using internet and has proof copying.
Student was then asked to write a letter of apology to Controller of evaluation and was allowed to finish exam as is. 
If possible could anyone tell the consequences that might cause by this ?

comments.body:
bro really got caught cheating and was told to write an APOLOGY LETTER?!? WHAT IS THIS, KINDERGARTEN??? 

NEXT TIME THEY'LL ASK HIM TO DRAW A SORRY CARD WITH GLITTER.

if this is how pesu handles malpractice, i think i wasted my life studying pointlessly

the second part is very clear and understandable, but I didn't get the required answer.  please don't think of cheating is for an Action that is going to happen in future and I'm asking for actions that's already happened in past.
Possession of electronic devices, papers, copying, etc. Besides nothing is worth the headache cheating brings. It'll be a black mark on your record

I just wanted to know what will the college do about this,  will the subject be failed or will the person be failed for a year ... ðŸ˜•, in vtu, the subject would be failed that's it,  I don't know what will they do in private university
They'd scold you, give you a fail for your subject, you'll have to take it as backlog. Maybe suspension...Idk I've never been in said situation
